annotations.description: I made a Dirty Wastelander form the game Fallout 4, and it's one of the strangest drinks I've ever made! If you've been following my channel for a minute you...
annotations.title: Dirty Wastelander from Fallout 4 Recipe | How to Drink

textContent:
1 Whole Baked Apple
4 to 6 Blackberries
4 oz. -or- 120 ml. Irish Whiskey

Shake like crazy with ice
Double strain (pulpy and slow)
Top with Cola (Ideally, Nuka.)

Baked Apple
Rome top and hollow core of apple
fill apple with butter, brown sugar, and spices of your choice (cinnamon, allspice, etc.)
Bake at 350Â° F for 7-10 minutes

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PnmEua8FKi0
title: Dirty Wastelander
